import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import './products.css' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import ALLPRODUCT from '../components/allproduct' import {Link, Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import { addProduct } from '../components/redux/cartredux' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import NAV from '../components/nav' function PRODUCT() { const [product, setproduct] = useState([]); const [category, setcategory] = useState(""); const quantity = useSelector(state => state.cart.quantity) console.log(quantity) const dispatch=useDispatch(); function addcart(item){ dispatch(addProduct({item,quantity})) } useEffect(async() => { const fetchdata=async()=>{ if(category=="") { const {data}=await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/product/`) setproduct(data) } else { const {data}=await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/product?category=${category}`) setproduct(data) } } fetchdata() }, [category]) const handler=(e)=>{ console.log(e.target.value); setcategory(e.target.value); } return (

All Product

New Arrival

{ product.map(item=>(

{item.title}

{item.price}

)) }
) } export default PRODUCT
